SEARCH
Module com.example.dicegame
Package model.records

Class Turn

java.lang.Object
model.records.Turn
public class Turn extends Object
Represents a turn in the game, including the score, the result of the turn, the selected dice, the remaining dice, and the displayed dice.

This class is used to store the details of each player's turn in the game, including the score achieved, the selected dice, and the remaining dice after the turn ends.

    • Turn

      public Turn(int turnScore, EndingOfTurn endingOfTurn, List<Dice> selectedDice, List<Dice> remainingDice, List<Dice> displayedDice)
      Constructs a new Turn instance.
      Parameters:
      turnScore - the accumulated score for this turn
      endingOfTurn - the result of the turn (e.g., SCORED, PASS, BUSTED)
      selectedDice - the list of dice selected during the turn
      remainingDice - the list of dice remaining after the turn
      displayedDice - the list of dice displayed after the turn
